physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a Pagoda on a hill in Moulmein. The Stupa is located at the top of a forest hill. It is surrounded by several smaller pagodas. More roofted buildings are located at the foot of the hill. There is a road from the front of the photograph leading up to the Pagoda hill.
